author: slaws
msg: Add the rmi samples to itest/samples. Commented out at the moment in the build.xml file as the service node is not shutting down cleanly when called from ant with a timeout. I also need to find a away to turing the timeout on only for itest/sample and allow the use to use it in a mode where the node blocks until a key is pressed.
